underlying_goal: Investigate customer order, delivery, and mileage usage records for specific customer email accounts by querying a database
friction_detail: Initial SQL query had an invalid column reference causing an error, and Claude confused which customer the user was asking about (defaulted to catbnlove instead of 0yousun0).
brief_summary: User wanted to investigate delivery and mileage records for specific customers via database queries; Claude provided mostly correct queries and results but had an initial SQL error and one customer mix-up.
